notes: FEATURE: The photo of a track is now displayed on its associated event card in the 'Upcoming Events' list.
ENHANCEMENT: Renamed the 'My Tracks' section to 'All Tracks' to clarify that tracks are a global, shared resource.
FEATURE: Tracks are now a global resource, visible to all users.
FEATURE: Added the ability to associate a track with an event from the event creation/editing modals.
ENHANCEMENT: The 'Edit Track' modal is now scrollable to accommodate all fields on smaller screens.
SECURITY: Only the user who created a track can edit or delete it.
FEATURE: Implemented full edit functionality for the Track Management feature.
FEATURE: Added the ability to upload or link a track layout image.
ENHANCEMENT: Track cards now include a link to view the track layout image directly on the page.
